msg: expose explicit SystemUsage configuration - changed to be the same as defaults in BrokerService - https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/AMQ-3574

author: cumminsh
msg: Removing general org.apache.aries.* range macros, and also redundant import * elements. We use both aries.osgi.import and aries.osgi.import.pkg to indicate imports, so this is the second batch of these changes.
